Job Title: Account Manager

Location: Pennsylvania, United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
Title: Account ManagerLocation: Virtual (a company based in Pottstown, PA)All work will be performed remotely, with some face-to-face meetings as needed.Hours: General Business Hours, but flexible Duration: Full Time, Exempt
AVS Life Sciences provides compliance consulting expertise for pharmaceutical, biotechnology, andmedical device industries. We are seeking an experienced client services account manager who knows the life sciences industry and can assist AVS with managing client accounts. Visit our website atwww.avs3.com & www.mwa-consulting.com to learn more about us.
SUMMARY: The Account Manager will oversee AVS Life Science client accounts to provide the best service to our client base.
Responsibilities:· Act as a point of contact for project sponsors and associate base to ensure work is done on time, within budget, and within scope.· Collaborate with Senior Management on account workload and resourcing on current and future projects.· Prepare and review proposal contracts and extensions.· Work with the operations team on audits, training, and project management.· Safeguard and promote high client satisfaction/retention and appropriately direct client feedback.· Provide timely updates on audit and project status to clients in coordination with recruitment activities.· With coaching and support prepare monthly metrics and reports keeping Senior Management advised of current issues with audit program.· Track project and client driven performance metrics and use them to improve systems, processes, and customer service.· Maintain and build strong, trusted, client relationships, serving as a primary contact for clients.· Participate in operational projects within AVS that include internal business operations processes, company communication policies/platforms, training of consultant staff, and other projects asrequired.· Manage other GXP projects as may be assigned by the CEO.
Requirements:· Minimum of 3-5 years of full-time experience working in a high-volume account management role in the life sciences.· Bachelor’s Degree in Life Sciences discipline.· Minimum of 3 years in Project Management, Quality Assurance, Regulatory, or other technical roles in the Life Sciences Industry (including medical device and biopharma).· Established track record managing GXP projects.· Ability and willingness to learn and work with a mentor· Demonstrated excellence in leadership ability.· Solid expertise in prioritizing and multitasking.· Self-sufficient, flexible, and able to work with little direct supervision.· Must be flexible to changing priorities and multi-task efficiently.· Collaborative team member with excellent organization skills, attention to detail and a strong sense of urgency and follow-through· Excellent communication skills (verbal, written, interpersonal, etc.), interview and negotiation skills, presentation, and influence credibly and work effectively at all levels of the organization.· Must be able to maintain a high degree of confidentiality.· Energetic personnel with a positive attitude.· High level of proficiency in Microsoft Word, PowerPoint, Outlook, FileMaker Pro· Experience with CRM systems (Insightly, Hubspot, etc.)· Participate in employer-sponsored training to enhance professional skills as necessary.

Experience Level (if available): None
